title: ono spots on da kine
name: ono spots on da kine
description:
A Map by Dvd

...and other memorable places on oahu from my four month stay after college. heath was inspired to move there for a yr by BP...although she'll never admit it. haha. island fever soon kicked in and we made our way back to the mainland.

properties.name: alan wong's restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 1857 S. King St., Honolulu, HI#8 on gourmet mag\'s list of america\'s 50 best restaurants. best fine dining on the island!!! i would highly suggest ordering the chef\'s tasting menu to get the full experience.

properties.name: diamond head hike
properties.description: Posted by Dvd take an early morning hike up to diamond head and enjoy the spectacular views of the island.

properties.name: giovanni's white shrimp truck
properties.description: Posted by Dvd Kamehameha Hwy, Kahuku, HIlocated along the main hwy in kahuku. 1 gets you two scoops of rice and 12 garlic shrimp...yum. a must try in hawaii. the place looks run down and dirty, but that just adds to its charm.

properties.name: irifune restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 563 Kapahulu Ave, Honolulu, HIthe garlic crab legs are soooo good. also, you must try the breaded tofu with ginger sauce ().

properties.name: kua 'aina sandwich - honolulu
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 1116 Auahi Street, Honolulu, HIgrilled mahi mahi burger!!!

properties.name: kua 'aina sandwich - north shore
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 66-160 Kamehameha Hwy Ste C, Haleiwa, HIyou have to try the grilled mahi mahi burger. the best!!! good place to stop on your way to the north shore.

properties.name: lanikai beach
properties.description: Posted by Dvd  Lanikai, HIso pretty on a sunny day. clear tranquil waters and white sand. best beach on the island.

properties.name: sansei seafood restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 2552 Kalakaua Ave, Honolulu, HIbest sushi rolls on the island. must try the rock shrimp appetizer.

properties.name: waimea beach park
properties.description: Posted by Dvd  nice beach on the north shore. make sure to jump off the famous queen\'s leap. beware the crazy waves during the winter season.

properties.name: waiola bakery and shave ice
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 525 Kapahulu Ave, Honolulu, HIbest shaved ice on the island!! so much better than matsumoto\'s.

properties.name: zippy's
properties.description: Posted by Dvd 601 Kapahulu Ave, Honolulu, HInothing hits the spot after a night of clubbin like zippy\'s chili with grilled cornbread.
